entities.name: fawkes
entities.description: Fawkes is Dumbledore's phoenix, described as tiny and ugly. It is placed on the tray of soft ashes beneath the golden post.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student who has caused damage by his actions tonight. He tries to say 'Good' but no sound comes out.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is Harry's teacher who is reminding him of the amount of damage he had caused by his actions tonight.

entities.name: madam pomfrey
entities.description: Madam Pomfrey is a teacher who is patching up everybody after the night's events.

entities.name: nymphadora tonks
entities.description: Nymphadora Tonks may need to spend time in St. Mungo's but will make a full recovery.

relationships.description: Dumbledore reminds Harry of the amount of damage he had caused by his actions tonight.
Madam Pomfrey is patching up everybody after the night's events.
Dumbledore informs Harry that Nymphadora Tonks may need to spend time in St. Mungo's but will make a full recovery.
Harry places Fawkes on the tray of soft ashes beneath the golden post.
